'''Balrog''', or '''balrogs''' may refer to:

==Characters==
* '''[[Balrogs]], the evil creatures of fire and shadow.'''
** [[Balrogs/Wings]], the debate on whether balrogs have wings.
* [[Durin's Bane]], the balrog of [[Moria]] killed by [[Gandalf]].
* [[Gothmog (balrog)]], the Lord of Balrogs who was killed by [[Ecthelion]] in [[Gondolin]].
